channel.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
channel.description:
Talk about life in general.
2010 is almost up, and it has been pretty much fucked up for me with only one or two happy events in between. In truth, my life has been fucked up since 2008.
What experiences did you have during this year? What are you hoping for next year? If you could, would you chance how this year passed?
Constructive posting, please

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:1, topic:374848”]Talk about life in general.

2010 is almost up, and it has been pretty much fucked up for me with only one or two happy events in between. In truth, my life has been fucked up since 2008.

What experiences did you have during this year? What are you hoping for next year? If you could, would you chance how this year passed?

Constructive posting, please[/quote]
Exactly the same for me

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:374848”]There’s so much negativity in this thread it’s unreal.

Anywho, my year was great, college is laid back as anything, 4 days a week doing an I.T diploma, earning small amounts of money from doing accounting and repairing people’s computers, got an amazing girlfriend, couldn’t really be any happier. :)[/quote]

Grats on your life mate

Also, grats on your job offer, David. Hope you like it there

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:13, topic:374848”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=470813.msg3443534#msg3443534 date=1293234714]
There’s so much negativity in this thread it’s unreal.

Anywho, my year was great, college is laid back as anything, 4 days a week doing an I.T diploma, earning small amounts of money from doing accounting and repairing people’s computers, got an amazing girlfriend, couldn’t really be any happier.
[/quote]

Finally a happy one. I was beginning to get depressed reading all those other ones!

And well my year has been pretty good, besides my grandmother dieing. There has been many more good then bad times (knock on wood) ;).[/quote]
Well I’ve had trouble with everything in my life. Family members, Friends, my girlfriend, my grades, my tennis, leading to my feeling depressed for a long time. I hit rock bottom when I broke up with my girlfriend though, and life has been pretty much the same since February (which is the month of my sister’s birth… coincidence, or? )

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:20, topic:374848”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=470813.msg3443983#msg3443983 date=1293270393]

[quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=470813.msg3443977#msg3443977 date=1293269736]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=470813.msg3443703#msg3443703 date=1293246566]

Pretty much no-lifed moparscape. Any questions?
[/quote]fail
[/quote]fu

I also switched over to online school, started volunteering at an elementary school, and got a job offer at a college. Any questions?

What kind of job…?
[/quote]Computer Information Systems department. One of two jobs of my choosing: Applications development or help desk and deployment.

Help desk is like general IT stuff around the college, with summer deployment being us exchanging old laptops and desktops with new ones (it’s a much bigger job than you’d think at a college with a huge number of staff)

Sounds pretty cool, I guess you’re gonna take the offer?[/quote]Maybe, but I’m debating whether or not it’s worth losing my summer over (would be full time), and the commute is like an hour a day (each way) with the busses =/

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:6, topic:374848”]It hasn’t been a great year for me at all to be honest. Grandmother died on November 9Th, and Uncle died on December 2nd. I’ve been in depression for the past three months, and it hasn’t gotten better. I’ve learned to deal with some of it a little.

Ex is being a total difficult person at the moment, which isn’t making things better.

I hope next year will be better.[/quote]
Been in depression for about 4 months, finally got over it kind of.
I feel you man

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

It hasn’t been a great year for me at all to be honest. Grandmother died on November 9Th, and Uncle died on December 2nd. I’ve been in depression for the past three months, and it hasn’t gotten better. I’ve learned to deal with some of it a little.

Ex is being a total difficult person at the moment, which isn’t making things better.

I hope next year will be better.

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

Been through alot of stress and depression almost the whole 2010, happy moments were rare. I hope 2011 will be good cause i think things are already starting to get better.

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:374848”]Crap, until the end of the year (now). I’ve been trying to make cash by trying online methods that didn’t work, now at the end of the year a friend quits his popular server and gives me everything thus i make 300 dollars (and going up still).

Nice end of year. Every year gets more boring…

I hope for next year I can be bothered to do something in the rsps community, I’ve just sat here and helped a few people but I never get the drive to actually make something again, so I hope next year I will be able to care that much to make something.[/quote]

The first three months I joined Moparscape, I was actually motivated to help new people, but suddenly I just lost the drive to help them. I’d like to get back to helping people myself, but I have been out of programming for a long time and I’ve forgotten a lot… Also, I’d like to learn SQL, which should take a big chunk of my time. Maybe I’ll go back to Java later and start helping a bit again, but no high hopes there.

ollie123:

End of 2010 grandad died, left me some money in his will, so a pretty shite end of the year.

Aww, Sorry for you mate
My grandfather died when I was 7, so I don’t really remember it, but for a few days family was pretty screwed…

Read full topic

item.title: Life, 2010 - 2011
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Crap, until the end of the year (now). I’ve been trying to make cash by trying online methods that didn’t work, now at the end of the year a friend quits his popular server and gives me everything thus i make 300 dollars (and going up still).

Nice end of year. Every year gets more boring…

I hope for next year I can be bothered to do something in the rsps community, I’ve just sat here and helped a few people but I never get the drive to actually make something again, so I hope next year I will be able to care that much to make something.

Read full topic
